TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Html32TextWriter extends System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter

summary.span: 將一系列 HTML 3.2 特定字元和文字寫入 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes a series of HTML 3.2–specific characters and text to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 類別會提供格式化功能，讓 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項可在向用戶端呈現 HTML 3.2 內容時加以使用。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering HTML 3.2 content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是替代類別。The class is an alternative to the class. 將 HTML 4.0 的樣式屬性轉換為相等的 HTML 3.2 標記和屬性。It converts HTML 4.0 style attributes into the equivalent HTML 3.2 tags and attributes. 它標準化屬性，例如色彩和字型，並使用 HTML 表格的傳播。It standardizes the propagation of attributes, such as colors and fonts, using HTML tables. ASP.NET 會自動使用這個類別針對 HTML 3.2 和較早的瀏覽器檢查屬性類別。ASP.NET automatically uses this class for HTML 3.2 and earlier browsers by checking the property of the class. 除非您建立自訂網頁或控制項配接器會使用 HTML 3.2 標記的裝置為目標，您不需要建立的執行個體明確類別。Unless you create a custom page or control adapter that targets devices that use HTML 3.2 markup, you do not need to create an instance of the class explicitly. 如需自訂網頁及控制項轉譯的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For more information about customizing page and control rendering, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，名為`CustomHtml32TextWriter`，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use a class, named `CustomHtml32TextWriter`, that derives from the class. `CustomHtml32TextWriter` 遵循模式所建立的兩個建構函式會建立類別並覆寫， ， ，和方法。`CustomHtml32TextWriter` creates two constructors that follow the pattern that is established by the class and overrides the , , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.TextWriter writer) cil managed

span.span: The that renders the HMTL content.

summary.span: 當提出要求的瀏覽器需要行縮排時，使用在 欄位內指定的行縮排，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the line indentation that is specified in the field when the requesting browser requires line indentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式傳遞欄位值，有下列兩個參數的第二個版本：The constructor passes the field value to a second version that has the following two parameters: - `writer`其可接受的執行個體類別。`writer`, which takes an instance of the class. - `tabString`其可接受的字串會定義行縮排。`tabString`, which takes a string that defines line indentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用自訂的類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that derives from the class. 它有兩個建構函式，這是標準的所有直接或間接衍生自的類別類別。It has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`、方法會取代任何`div`所呈現的控制項的項目`table`項目。If the property is `true`, the method replaces any `div` elements that are rendered by a control with `table` elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderAfterContent() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderAfterContent () As String

summary.span: 寫入任何出現在 HTML 項目內容之後的文字或間距。

span.span: Writes any text or spacing that appears after the content of the HTML element.

returns.span: 要在 HTML 項目內容之後寫入的間距或文字，如果沒有這樣的資訊可以呈現，則為 。

span.span: The spacing or text to write after the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 每個覆寫方法會先檢查是否`th`項目會呈現，然後再使用方法來檢查要求的裝置是否可以顯示粗體格式。Each overridden method first checks whether a `th` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果裝置支援粗體設定，方法會寫入結尾標記`b`項目。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `b` element. 如果裝置不支援粗體設定，方法會寫入結尾標記`font`項目。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `font` element. 接下來，程式碼會檢查是否`h4`項目會呈現，然後再使用屬性檢查要求的裝置是否可以顯示斜體格式。Next, the code checks whether an `h4` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果裝置支援斜體格式，方法會寫入結尾標記`i`項目。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the closing tag of an `i` element. 如果裝置不支援斜體格式，方法會寫入結尾標記`font`項目。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `font` element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderAfterTag() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderAfterTag () As String

summary.span: 寫入在 HTML 項目的結尾標記之後的任何空格或文字。

span.span: Writes any spacing or text that occurs after an HTML element's closing tag.

returns.span: 要在 HTML 項目結尾標記之後寫入的間距或文字，如果沒有這樣的資訊可以呈現，則為 。

span.span: The spacing or text to write after the closing tag of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 這個程式碼會檢查是否`a`所呈現項目。The code checks whether an `a` element is being rendered. 如果是這樣，方法會寫入結尾標記`small`項目。If so, the method writes the closing tag of a `small` element. 如範例方法會執行的相同檢查`a`項目，然後將之開頭標記`small`項目。The example for the method performs the same check for the `a` element, and then writes the opening tag of the `small` element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderBeforeContent() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderBeforeContent () As String

summary.span: 寫入任何出現在 HTML 項目所包含之內容之前的定位間距或字型資訊。

span.span: Writes any tab spacing or font information that appears before the content that is contained in an HTML element.

returns.span: 要在呈現 HTML 項目內容之前寫入的字型資訊或間距，如果沒有這樣的資訊可以呈現，則為 。

span.span: The font information or spacing to write before rendering the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 這個程式碼會檢查是否`th`項目會呈現，然後再使用方法來檢查要求的裝置是否可以顯示粗體格式。The code checks whether a `th` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果裝置支援粗體設定，方法將寫入之開頭標記`b`項目。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `b` element. 如果裝置不支援粗體設定，方法將寫入之開頭標記`font`具有項目`color`屬性設定為紅色的十六進位值。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for red. 接下來，每個方法會檢查是否`h4`項目會呈現，然後再使用屬性檢查要求的裝置是否可以顯示斜體格式。Next, each method checks whether an `h4` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果裝置支援斜體格式，方法將寫入之開頭標記`i`項目。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of an `i` element. 如果裝置不支援斜體格式，方法將寫入之開頭標記`font`具有項目`color`屬性設為深藍色的十六進位值。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for navy blue. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderBeforeTag() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderBeforeTag () As String

summary.span: 將任何出現在 HTML 項目開頭標記之前的文字或定位間距寫入 HTML 3.2 輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes any text or tab spacing that occurs before the opening tag of an HTML element to the HTML 3.2 output stream.

returns.span: 要在標記之前呈現的 HTML 字型和間距資訊，如果沒有這樣的資訊可以呈現，則為 。

span.span: The HTML font and spacing information to render before the tag; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 這個程式碼會檢查是否`a`所呈現項目。The code checks whether an `a` element is being rendered. 如果是這樣，覆寫方法將寫入之開頭標記`small`項目。If so, the overridden method writes the opening tag of a `small` element. 如範例執行的相同檢查`a`項目，然後寫入結尾標記`small`項目。The sample for the performs the same check for the `a` element, and then writes the closing tag of the `small` element. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`div`指定元素和屬性值是`true`、方法會執行基本`table`格式呈現內容中所包含的項目`div`項目。If a `div` element is specified and the property value is `true`, the method performs basic `table` element formatting to present the content that is contained in the `div` element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the and methods. 每個覆寫檢查是否`Label`項目會呈現，然後再使用方法來檢查要求的裝置是否可以顯示粗體格式。Each override checks whether a `Label` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果裝置支援粗體設定，方法將寫入之開頭標記`b`項目和方法會寫入結尾標記。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `b` element and the method writes its closing tag. 如果裝置不支援粗體設定，方法將寫入之開頭標記`Font`具有項目`color`屬性設定為十六進位值代表紅色，而方法會寫入結尾標記。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `Font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for red, and the method writes the closing tag. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the and methods. 每個覆寫檢查是否`span`項目會呈現，然後再使用屬性檢查要求的裝置是否可以顯示斜體格式。Each override checks whether a `span` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果裝置支援斜體格式，方法將寫入之開頭標記`i`項目和方法會寫入結尾標記。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of an `i` element and the method writes its closing tag. 如果裝置不支援斜體格式，方法將寫入之開頭標記`Font`具有項目`color`屬性設為深藍色的十六進位值和方法會寫入結尾標記。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `Font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for navy blue, and the method writes the closing tag. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#2)]
